label: identifier
comment: A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the organization or company. (Link Resolver - GS1 company prefix?)

rangeIncludes.comment: An identifier of a party, product, or facility that is defined by an identifier scheme and idenfier value and, optinally, verification evidence

domainIncludes.comment: The Party class represents an entity such as an organization, or a company that manufactured the product.
The physical site (eg farm or factory) where the product or materials was produced.
